Name: SCORE
About the game: SCORE, is a mix between an Open World Multiplayer Game and a Football Simulation where players compete for fame, glory and wealth on a global scale on the pitch. SCORE immerses the player in a realistic environment that tests the player's ability to function as a member on a football team. Buy apartments, cars, guns, clothes, furniture. Race downtown. with your earned money playing as a soccer player *(this feature is being rebuild and will release in 2018) Reputation, money, glory - it's all on the line. Just like in soccer leagues, players can be traded and bought by either AI or Player coaches of other clubs - Teams will be able to play a fully featured soccer game in 'Club Mode', and other tourneys, like National and International Tournaments, custom games and play locally with up to 8 players. Play with passion. Get it all.
